content.detailedDescription:
Last night my girlfriend and i were sitting on our front porch watching some neighbors shoot off fireworks. at approx. 9:20 pm i noticed what at first looked like an airplane breaking through the clouds to the south of our location, approx. 4-5 miles away. 
i am a former flight instructor, and very familiar with aircraft and aircraft movements. this vehicle was a bright orange color, almost looked like it was on fire. there were no navigation lights on it, just a steady orange color. the object moved slowly towards our location. the movement wasn't straight, it would move laterally, then back towards us, then laterally. 
between the erratic movements, and color made us both think this wasn't a typical aircraft. there wasn't any noise. at this point i stood up to get a better look, i was concerned that the movement would take it out of view.
at this point the object seemed to come to a stand still. i grabbed my phone to video what was happening, at which point the object seemed to slowly back up and ascend back into the clouds out of sight.
my girlfriend and i both looked at each other and said that was really weird.
as i said i am a former flight instructor, i know an airplane doesn't move in that manner, with no navigation lights, or sound it wasn't a helicopter. also i know most helicopters don't usually fly at night into ifr conditions. the light that was emitted from the vehicle did reflect off the bottom of the cloud base. i thought perhaps a drone, again there wasn't any sound, and drones aren't permitted to fly above 400 feet.
i waited till today, as i wanted to sleep on what we saw, and rationally think about what it could've been. i don't have a logical answer at this point. 
as stated earlier this was observed by both myself and my girlfriend.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw the light come out of the clouds moving towards us bright orange light, then went back up into the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down from cleveland toward dalton and looked up to my left and saw what looked like a rectangular hover craft in the sky and was dumfounded for quite some time
content.summary: It looked like a rectangular hover craft in stealth mode w/o a propultion fan

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this abduction here because i couldn't find any other place. so here we go: i was born in 1954. these abductions took place to the best of my knowledge on 3 to 4 times. i believe they must have started in 1959 to 1962. i would have been 5 to 8 years old. they all took place at night. they had to have taken place between midnight and 3:00 am. the first one i remember 3 entities in my bedroom and physically taking me from my be. then between touching me and into their ship, i always had a blank. the 3 that came in our house i can describe today quite well. please remember this was before i had ever heard of ufos. 
     i have apparently ran out of space to write here. i am running into boxes.     

so i am not sure how to proceed from here. i have quite a bit of information. i can describe in detail what these begins looked like and inside the ship i was taken into. i also still have to this day, a apparent metal object in my foot.  that was operated on unsuccessfully by doctors in the early sixties. if someone can contact me and let me further know how to proceed, i am at your complete disposal.The proof is still in me.
content.summary: This was my abduction 3-4 times

content.detailedDescription:
In my patio
just looked to the mountains
thought it was a plane or a helicopter
red ball of light making incredible direction changes and dropping behind the mountain and reappearing
shock
just stayed behind the mountain
content.summary: Red ball of light over mt baldy taking strange directional changes that wher either plane or helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
Just saw a bright light star like pass by my house . went straight across whole out having a smoke. no fiireworks looks like this%^$* !!!! scary as &%^
think it was green.
content.summary: Brght lght past the front of my house

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were watching fireworks and saw an object with white,red,blue,and green lights in the sky it acsended in a straight line and hovered there a while and then made a circle turned and went back to were we first saw it then it decended behind the trees to the ground it looked like. a few mins later it reascended it did this a few times before disappearing , also in the sky were a few 3 white light ufos triangular but we see these often and were not alarmed, could also hear helicopters in the area but could not hear them this is also a common thing for us when we see these ufos not sure if they are government craft but i suspect some are though not all of them some just defy what i consider to be of earth
content.summary: My son and i were watching the fireworks and saw an object in the sky it had white,blue, green, and red lights decended and reasecended 3 times also saw other 3 lighted triangle crafts

content.detailedDescription: i was out on the back porch having a cigarette just scanning the sky back & forth watching fireworks.I heard the neighbors radio start to crackle like it was kinda off station, then i noticed the object in the sky to the south. i recall thinking it was an odd looking firework but, it kept moving across the sky. the object was spherical in shape glowing a yellow/orangish color, with a red glowing dome. it traveled from the south in a slight northwest direction. i walked along the east side of the house so i could see where it was going. it came over the house & kept its northwesterly direction. as it traveled to the tree line it ascended up towards the stratisphere.
content.summary: It was a spherical shaped yellowish/orangish object with what appeared to be a bright red dome. the whole thing just glowed as it made its way across the sky, in no particular kind of a hurry.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio behind my house and was photographing the sun because there was a haze in the sky that made a circle around the sun. after taking the photograph i went inside to look at it. i noticed in the photograph a small bluish green colored dot. when i zoomed in on it i noticed that it was a ball-shaped object with bright green points of light in it. i went outside and looked up at the circle around the sun and so nothing with my naked eye i took another photograph and the same object appeared only the points of light in the object were in a different configuration. i took several more photos and the object appeared in every one of them and the points of light change configuration every time.
content.summary: I was photographing the sun and noticed an object in the photos that did not appear to the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: Drove to countryfest music festival appro 00|15hrs.Saw 3 orange lights parelell to each other and looked to be moving slowly over the campground area.They then positioned themselves in a triangle formation as they seemed to raise in elevation. asked my passenger to video if possible and some of course blurry videoo is available.Light continued to rise and faded out after about 3 minutes. shortly after a single light appeared in the same area for approx 30 secs. these lights were over a festival where i would guess about 10,000 people were attending, i am really hoping someone else has the same info. when the people we were picking up got to vehicle, i asked if they had seen the ufo"s, she in fact said she had, but described 1 single green light about 15 mins earlier. please tell me someone else at festival has reported,,,,ps i know what spotlights look like, i know what fireworks look like,,,,,coincidently while lights were happening, fire trucks were dispatched to same campgrounds for a generator explosion,again the explosion was not the cause of lights. my intial thought about the lights werei wondered wht they would have strret light so high in the air, as they did at first resemble the light color of street light. if my passenger gets the video to me i will make it available if you have interest,
content.summary: Saw 3 lights in straight line, lights moved into triangle and slowly seemed to fade. 1 single light appearedshortly after

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my 2 children watching distant fireworks when this red oval bright red light came over the treetops above the trees, i shouted for my kids to see it , they did hen it shot out of sight to the south and wa gone ina flash. it was as big as my thumb in the sky, no flashing lites, there were planes in the sky all flashing lites  this was big and definately not an airplane or helicopter or firework. when i saw it i was shocked and transfixed on it the kids were also in awe about it. the whole sighting lasted maybe 30 seconds or so i was so shocked i did not really look for discriminating marks or features just watched it as it hovered then moved to the south and then gone in a split second`
content.summary: Red oval light the size of my thumb treetop level, hovered moved then disappeared out of site heading south

content.detailedDescription: White hovering ufo in daylight sky. i always film them.
content.summary: White glowing object parked in sky

content.detailedDescription: We were watching my neighbors fireworks when i noticed something orange that kind of looked like a helicopter i noticed the object moving across the sky at the altitude a plain would it then stopped suddenly stayed there for30 seconds and the slowely disappeared
content.summary: Moved across sky west. stoped then slowely disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My trail camera was set to record video on the night of 2 july 2016. i usually have it set to still shots to capture deer eating my plants however i decided last night to try it in video mode. at 10:30pm on 2 july 2016 per the time stamp on the video it captured a video of two objects. both were rod shaped. one moved from from right to left the other was higher than that one and appeared to have five small glowing lights. it moved in an upward manner from left to right. neither was very large as can be seen on the screenshot from the video and the video itself. the object that moved from right to left can be seen in the video coming in from the right, rising and then making an arc towards the ground.
content.summary: Two rod shaped objects moving opposite directions captured with my trail camera.

content.detailedDescription:
On my back deck i took a picture of the clouds before a storm came through.  a couple days later when viewing the picture i noticed a shape in the clouds that resembled some sort of craft.

i took several pictures seconds apart and those pictures did not have the shape in them.

attached are 2 pictures, the first one is the original picture, the second one has contrast to it.

can't tell if its part of the cloud formation or not.
content.summary: Object in clouds?

content.detailedDescription: Driving home to our residence. made a right hand turn off of baltimore annapolis blvd. onto kempton road. before making a left onto barbara court my wife noticed a configuration in the night sky she described as the "big dipper", i looked up recognized it wasn't a star configuration, had her stop the car and turn out the vehicle's lights. i was then able to snap 2 pictures. the first picture showed four lights in a square configuration with two other objects catching up to the first four. the second picture shows the objects lighting up into angle shaped crafts with multiple lights. we witnessed these objects for several minutes before they took off across the horizon at high speed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple objects hovering and flying across the horizon at night.

content.detailedDescription:
I left our cottage at 10:40 to watch canada day fireworks. the display began at 10:45. it was set off across a bay at the victoria beach pier which is about a good half mile away from out viewing area called redwing park. about 5 minutes into the display,i noticed a red starlike object behind the fireworks over lake winnipeg.At first i thought it was part of the show but it was constant. knowing my planets and stars i thought it looked out of place being so red and about 25 degrees above the lake due west.As i kept observing the object,i noticed that it began moving up and down several degrees.It continued to do this every few minutes until the show ended at 11 pm.
at that moment i called my wife over to witness the object.
shortly after the display ended,the object began to approach the area where the fireworks were being set off. it then stopped and made a sharp right turn heading north for a short distance(5-10 seconds). it then changed directions again and headed west back over lake winnipeg until we could no longer see it due to the trees.As stated i know my planets.Jupiter was just off to the left of the fireworks at about 30 degrees and mars and saturn much further to the south and east.
the altitude of the object was hard to judge but it was lower than the cirrus clouds. i estimate about 5 000 feet.
i was amazed with what i was seeing. it completely took my attention away from the fireworks. the strange thing was that at least 40 other people were there. i felt like saying something but because i didn't know anybody i was hesitant to comment especially since they were enjoying the fireworks. that is why i had to get my wife's attention(she had left before me so she too was standing amongst strangers).
it is unfortunate that as we stayed to observe,everyone had already departed.
that is when things got very weird.I am surprised that nobody else has reported this. there were probably hundreds of people out that night at various locations along the east shores of lake winnipeg taking in canada day fireworks.
wonder if it could have been a drone???
ps-i don't own a phone and my wife said it wouldn't have come out looking like much on hers.
content.summary: Watching fireworks over lake winnipeg and noticed a bright red starlike object behind and above fireworks.It moved up and down every few minutes and then came closer to the area of the fireworks once they had all been set off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed when my husband came running upstairs out of breath telling me to come out on the deck right away, "there's lights doing crazy things out there you need to see it!" i grabbed my cellphone and ran downstairs to the deck. at first i saw nothing, he explained there were 6 orbs in a triangle formation and he couldn't believe what he saw. my husband is a notorious skeptic. i stared into the sky until i suddenly saw a bright blue flash and 6 orbs in an arced formation just hovering. no sound. no further movement. we just watched them in disbelief. they then merged back into one blue orb and disappeared. this happened 2 times. then we noticed the clouds on the horizon appeared to be shaking, we spotted a dark black shape in the clouds,too dark to actually be a cloud. then another blue flash much brighter than the other and 6 blue orbs shot over our house and towards the south. we ran outside to see if we could see them from the front but saw nothing. we went back onto the deck, saw a few more flashes but nothing else as dramatic. then everything stopped. this played out over about an hour. i was so frightened, i was almost crying. there was no way this was a searchlight or a spotlight as it was coming down fron the sky not as if it was pointed up.
craziest thing i have ever seen.
i have some photos but due to it being so dark it's hard to make out. i tried to video but it didn't show at all.
content.summary: 6 blue orbs that would form one giant orb, then separate again- nearby a dark black object against the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were in ventura california 7/3/16 at approx 1:00 pm 1300 hrs. as we were turning from seaward ave. onto us101 freeway north, i noticed that there was what i thought was a parasail near the beach. since my son was driving, i was able to look at it for a few seconds. i then realized that it was way too high and hence way too big to be a parasail. it was large and grey with a very angular shape that is hard to describe. we were in the turning lane onto the freeway and traffic was heavy so we were commited to our turn so we took the next exit (sanjon) and came back south on harbor blvd toward seaward ave. while on harbor blvd we could catch glimpses of it but it seemed to be farther away and had shifted to a vertical position and was heading south along the coast. by the time we got to the beach at seaward ave. the object was gone. i was very excited to see this as i've never had a sighting as an adult. i had my smart phone in my hand the whole time but was too excited to think to snap some pics or video. i'm pretty disappointed in this fact but at least my son saw it too.
content.summary: Large grey angular  over beach area proceeded south along coast toward oxnard. appeared to shift from horizontal to vertical. disappeared from my view.

content.detailedDescription: While everyone was watching the european championships i went to the kitchen and started cooking. somehow i felt the urge to look out of the window which points towards west. the sun was already setting and i realized a strange but perfectly disc shaped cloud below the average height. my phone was right next to me so i immediately took a picture,turned around to check the qualify and as i turned back to the "cloud" it had been completely vanished. i felt so baffled as not even 10 to 15 seconds had passed between shooting the picture and turning back to check if it was still floating.
content.summary: Was cooking while eveyone watched soccer. turned to the window,shot a pic 15secs later vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo popped out of heavy clouds heading west. smoothly changed direction to south. appeared to maintain it's altitude. distance from us was probably @ a mile. 
ups planes fly over frequently at night, i would say it was about the size of a 757. it made no sound. it appeared oval but the white center appeared to change shape from a cross to oval. the very prominent red-yellow-orange oval aura that surrounded the ufo did not appear to change shape. it just gradually headed out of our sight. amazing.
content.summary: Glowing oval ufo, dropped from clouds heading w changed to s kept altitude

content.detailedDescription: This was a little over a year and a half ago. i was at a high school marching band practice, and our instructor made us all stand at attention, holding our horns up and not moving or talking at all, for a very long time. during this time, our instructor was walking back and forth, yelling at us and making sure we were all in line. i wasn't a fan of this particular instructor, who only came once every few months or so, and my enthusiasm was low. getting bored, i began to look around. at some point i became aware of what seemed to be a group of balloons, but at first i only caught glimpses as our instructor was being particularly harsh, singling out me and several others. when he turned his attention to someone else, i looked again to see, very clearly, that these were not balloons, but metallic discs. it was a large group of them - from what i can remember it looked to be anywhere from 20-30. it was very sunny, and the surfaces of these objects were silvery and reflective furthermore, their motions didn't match the motion of the wind, like a group of balloons would, but rather resembled the motion of a flock of birds. they changed directions rapidly  and constantly changed elevation, moving up and down in smooth motions. eventually, i had to turn my attention back to my instructor and when i got the chance to look again they were gone. i would have taken a photo had i not been standing at attention for the entire duration of the sighting. i told my mother and she didn't believe me, but the next day i asked an acquaintance of mine, who was standing next to me when i saw it, if he had seen anything, and he told me that he had but that he had no idea of what it could have possibly been. i told my mother this, and she still seemed somewhat skeptical. however, about 2 days later, she was driving in a nearby area and saw something strange, and when she described it to me it matched what i had seen. we were confused and maybe a little bit uneasy about what it could have been, but we soon forgot about it, dismissing it as an unsolvable mystery. it still comes up occasionally in conversation, and, having recently become interested in ufo phenomena, i thought that i should report it.
content.summary: My mother, an acquaintance, and i witnessed a group/swarm of flying metallic discs seemingly moving like a flock of birds at different times.

content.detailedDescription: We were at the riverside to watch the queen elizabeth cruise ship leave port from the opposite shore there were fireworks and quite a few people were gathered to watch when my daughter pointed out a small green light in the sky a long way off from the fireworks some said it was a drone we agreed most likely but we kept an eye on it and then when we thought about it if was a drone observing the fireworks then it was too high and too far away and over the sea anyway i said my thoughts out loud and no one replied but a few that were with me and they agreed with my observation we watched as the light stayed in position for a few minuses then rose abruptly and from the distance away from us we thought up about 1000ft in about 2sec it then hovered and i am not sure but i think it came back down to where it had been then hovered for a bit then sped forward we thought about 1000ft again in about 2sec hovered  for a few sec then slowly moved to the west and dissapeared behind a cloud.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small green light moving from east to west stopped hovered shot straight up hovered shot down hovered sped to west short distance an stopped moved slowly behind clouds an not seen again

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at night searching for ufos as i usually do. i was asking in my head for the beings to show themselves to me. looks like i was answered because as i was taking photos of the last light of the day i caught an anomaly or entity in one of my photos that i only noticed the next day. very strange. i did not tamper with the photo except zoom in to show more detail on the anomaly.
content.summary: Caught strange anomaly while looking for ufos

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10 p.M. july 2, 2016, i was traveling due west on my motorcycle on highway 70, approximately 1/2 of a mile past the junction of 70 and 128. the night was warm, weather was dry and clear with very good visibility. the road was three lanes wide with approx. forty yards from tree line to tree line. tree height is 30 to 40 feet.
 i first noticed flashing lights just entering my view above the tree line to the north of my line of sight. the object appeared to be traveling diagonally across my line of sight to the southwest. it appeared to be at approx. 60 to 70 degrees above the ground. at first i thought it was a low flying small aircraft. however i quickly realized the navigation lights were unlike anything i had ever seen on any aircraft. my next thought was that due to its apparent low speed and height (my impression) that it could be a blimp. however it didnt have a traditional navigation light pattern. 
here is my description of the object i saw: it had a flashing white light at the back with a second flashing white light slightly below the first. a row of sequentially strobing white light along the (what i took to be) underside with a single red light at the front. above the bottom lights was a single row of six, square, hard edged windows that emitted a bright white light. this all seemed to be attached to a solid structure of a light blue/gray/silver color. i could not see any other hard edges, however i got the impression that the windows or light panels were attached to a v shaped hull. i could only see the side facing me but it seem that there was a glow from where the other side would be, so one might assume that it was symmetrical. once or twice when the uppermost rear light flashed, i thought i saw some structure above the light, but i am unsure of that. there were no other lights above the windows or anywhere else other than the one i describe.
 i would like to describe the lights and the order in which they flashed. the first light in the sequence was the uppermost rear white light followed by the lower rear white light (these two were the largest and brightest of the flashing lights). the two rear lights seem to have a longest duration and gap between them. after the lower light flashed, a row of eight to ten, sequentially flashing white light flashed from the rear lower large light to the front (direction of travel). these lights were fast (maybe a half second, rear to front), smaller and less intense than the two rear most lights. at the end of this sequence, at the front most point, the last light to flash was red. after a short (half second) pause, the pattern would repeat. the windows or light panels maintained a steady bright glow. the light was a very bright white with a blueish tinge. they appeared to be the same size and distance apart, taking up approx. 1/3 of the visible structure.
the object stayed in view for approx. one minute before its travel and the height of the surrounding trees blocked my view. the road turned more southerly and i re acquired the object in my view for approx. 10 to 20 seconds and then intermittently through the trees for a short while. it appeared to stay on the same course and height for as long as i had it in my view. 
if i extended my arm and turned my hand horizontal, i could have covered the object with my thumb, from the tip to midway past the first joint. this is an approximation as i was not able to do this at the time.
my only feelings were of curiosity as to what the object was. 
some information on myself and that evening. i was clearheaded, i had not consumed any drugs or alcohol. i dont do drugs legal or otherwise (im allergic to most narcotic pain killers), i am not on any psychotropic medications (nor do i have reason to believe i should be) and rarely drink.
 my only thoughts at the time i first saw the object were of getting home and enjoying the ride as the evening cooled off. i live in a relatively high aircraft traffic zone and have seen navigation lights from all angles, heights and on many types of aircraft. i have seen drones of various sizes. i have seen blimps in daytime and i have seen them at night at sporting events, however i have never seen one operating at night in a rural area. the object i saw falls outside of my personal experience, and searching online i was unable to find any aircraft with lights of this type, including blimps and the virgin lightships. i am a rationalist and a firm believer in occams razor. i enjoy debunking other peoples misidentifications and wild conclusions. i would be quite happy to have you identify this as a blimp, if, in fact thats what this was.
content.summary: Sequentially strobing lights with bright hard edged row of windows, low speed and apperant height

content.detailedDescription: Saw a square with 4 orange lights sometimes yellow hovering over w 18 st in deer park around 845 to 9 00 ,i was on my motor cycle going for a ride when i noticed it .I pulled over and was observing it .It was glowing orange/yellow hovering .Then it started moving to the north and rising i got back on the bike and followed it down 18th st in deer park .It started to climb straight up .Then lights went out and i saw what i think was a square box shape . it was amazing . this was on 6-25-16 around 8 45 .I have been looking every night to see if it comes back .The closest radar is at republic airport in farmingdale ny on route 110 .Im sure it was picked up on radar !!!
content.summary: Saw square 4orange lights on bottom at about 1000 ft hovered then climed and disapeared to the north in deer park

content.detailedDescription: Over 15 people viewed this in maracana stadium located in cinta costera panama city. object did not moved for more than an hour. it had a light for a period of time then it went off and looked like metalic material. then started moving towards some clouds and it left.
content.summary: It was just floating very high in the sky, when i got there the light was already off but other people di'd saw it lid.

content.detailedDescription:
While outside my home looking roughly nnw, the object in question caught my eye when it crossed my direction of view. right at the 12 o'clock position relative to where i was standing. 

initially i dismissed it as a plane but it piqued my interest after i immediately realized there were no navigational lights and the second observed flash was at a distance that, to me, could not have been covered in such a short time by a commercial airliner. it was a flashing beacon of light with no other observable characteristics. plain white, not exceptionally bright. no noticeable sound, but it could have been washed out by the noise of the nearby freeway. 

sighting duration was too short to say for certain there was a pattern. in total 5 flashes were observed. 3 of them were evenly spaced over time. there was a short period where i'd have expected another flash as it would have happened if it were purely sequential. the flash resumed after this with the same rhythm until i lost it behind the trees obscuring my view.

my guesses at prosaic explanations have fallen short of my observation, however it may still have a prosaic origin. based on my past observations, it was far too fast to be a satellite flaring in the sunlight. it was certainly too fast to be an airliner unless it was in relatively close proximity. the lack of navigational lights and sound indicates it was, at the very least, non-commercial. military craft or hobbyist's quadcopter cannot be definitively ruled out.
content.summary: Flashing beacon moving at apparently high speed

content.detailedDescription:
It was night at newcastle casino, in oklahoma...
i was looking the sky because it was so beautiful with the lightning and pink color; you can look at my video; i had the idea to do a movie (with my smart phone) and i said to the people there," it's a movie " and an indian woman was playing a clown then an american woman said you can put this on you tube, it's too funny"
then i had look at my movie but nothing was recorded! i was very surprised... i did another movie with only the view of the lightning this time and i saw, as i was recording, an object asfastas the lightning near a lamppost... it was just afractionof asecond but i already know, it was something very rare and unknown to myself...
i went back in the casino after that, i had played a little bit but i felt a bit strange...
in the morning of june12th,2016; i put the movie on my computer and i saw better, it was not a meteorite or a lightning ball or a drone or a plane but probably a real ufo...
at my work, my co-worker agreed, it's probably a ufo and i was very lucky to get it with such aqualityvideo
content.summary: I saw a ufo as fast as the lightning on a straight-line path at night in newcastle, oklahoma...

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11pm, on july 2, 2016, i was driving home from work in south river, ontario. traveling north on hwy 11, i spotted a bright orange ball of light slowly moving west to east across the sky. it did not appear to be a plane or other aircraft, there were no flashing lights, and no noise. 
i pulled over to take a photo. the two i got with my cell phone, are not good, they only show a distant speck of light in the sky, but i arrived home and immediately googled "ufo orange ball of light", and found this video which shows a multitude of objects resembling what i saw, crossing a night sky. 
i have never paid much attention to ufo stories, but this was definitely something strange.
content.summary: Driving home from work, north on hwy 11, north of south river, ontario. saw bright orange ball of light moving west to east across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the schoolyard of a well known english-language high school in saint lambert, quebec, with my mother and sister. very little light pollution at night, which is why i was there planet gazing with my 127mm reflector telescope. we all saw exactly what i'm about to describe. the object silently glided out of a  west-south-westerly direction when i noticed it, and was travelling in a perfectly straight line on an east-north-east bearing. i could not get a fix on it with my telescope due to using an equatorial mount unsuited for following near or fast moving objects. the object itself looked like a satellite with two parrellel solar panels connected at one end to a main block.  i say they looked like solar panels because they had a black surface with a bronzey graph layout on them. the overall shape was a lot like a y-wing from star wars. but this thing was way too close to have been a satellite; i could see the light from my iphone reflecting off its surface, so it had to have been low. it flew directly over my head, and at that apparent altitude i would say it wasn't moving fast than 30 km/h. speed and direction were both constant, but orientation was constantly and slowly changing in an unpredictable way. it turned in such a way on at least two axes, in no apparent order. the direction of these rotations were changing of their own accord. it was very visibly reflecting light as it rotated to face various directions, although it was totally unclear where the front or back of this craft could be. suffice to say it really reminded me of a satellite as one would appear if it were that close. the best explanation i could come up with was that it could be a box kite from which the string had been cut, but that did not account for the way it was moving at all, or how far it moved seeing as it kept its heading and disappeared over the horizon. also, the winds here were at an average of only 12km/h at the time, which barely registered as a breeze for me on the ground. definitely not the kind of weather that could keep a kite in the air. this thing wasn't moving or rotating like something carried by the wind, it was moving like something that had no regard for gravity at all, and it maintained its very low altitude for its entire pass from what i could tell. it was moving like an uncoupled fighter craft in battlestar galactica, able to change its orientation without changing its direction of movement. i don't know what else to say about it. it was by far the weirdest thing i've ever seen in the sky, it's contours were so visible and sharp it completely blew my mind. if anyone has ever seen something like that, i yearn to ponder with them what the heck it could be.
content.summary: Dark y-wing shaped satellite-looking object silently flying extremely low in a straight line rotating randomly but surely on multiple axes.
